cards.name: Daenerys Targaryen
cards.text: Action: Search the top 10 cards of your deck for an attachment or Dragon card, reveal it, and add it to your hand (you may put it into play instead if its printed cost is 3 or lower). Shuffle your deck. (Limit once per round.)
cards.flavor: "Why do the gods make kings and queens, if not to protect the ones who can't protect themselves?"

cards.name: Drogon
cards.text: No attachments. Each Stormborn character you control gains renown. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Drogon is attacking, kill each character the defending player controls with STR 1 or lower.

cards.name: Rhaegal
cards.text: No attachments. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Rhaegal is attacking, choose and stand another character you control. Then, if that character has the Dragon or Stormborn trait, stand Rhaegal. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Viserion
cards.text: No attachments. Each Stormborn character you control gains stealth. While Viserion is attacking, each participating non-Dragon, non-Stormborn characters gets -2 STR.

cards.name: Khal Drogo
cards.text: Renown. Interrupt: When an Army or Dothraki character would be returned to your hand, discard 1 card from your hand to save it.
cards.flavor: "Come, my blood. The stallions call, this place is ashes. It is time to ride."

cards.name: Galazza Galare
cards.text: Reaction: After you marshal Galazza Galare, search the top 10 cards of your deck for, either: a [targaryen] character with printed cost 6 or higher, or up to 3 [targaryen] characters with printed cost 2 or lower. Reveal each searched-for card and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Jhogo
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a [military] challenge in which you control 2 or more attacking Dothraki characters, move 1 power from the losing opponent's faction card to your own.
cards.flavor: "Khaleesi, we saw him strike you. Would you see the color of his blood?"

cards.name: The Shavepate
cards.text: Challenges Action: Pay X gold to put a character with printed cost X or lower into play from your discard pile. (Limit once per phase.)
cards.flavor: "... I say that blood must pay for blood. Take one man from each of the families I have named and kill him. The next time one of yours is slain, take two from each great House and kill them both. There will not be a third murder."

cards.name: Rakharo
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a [military] challenge in which you control 2 or more attacking Dothraki characters, discard 1 card at random from the losing opponent's hand.
cards.flavor: "Khaleesi, better a man should swallow scorpions than trust in the spawn of shadows, who dare not show their face beneath the sun. It is known."

cards.name: The Titan's Bastard
cards.text: Action: Kneel The Titan's Bastard to return a Mercenary character from your discard pile to your hand.
cards.flavor: "That one has an evil reputation, even in Westeros. Do not be misled by his manner, Your Grace." <cite>Ser Barristan Selmy</cite>

cards.name: Barsena Blackhair
cards.text: No attachments except Weapon. While there is a Weapon attachment attached to Barsena Blackhair, she gets +3 STR.
cards.flavor: Daenerys would have prohibited contests between women as well, but Barsena Blackhair protested that she had as much right to risk her life as any man.

cards.name: Captain Groleo
cards.text: Reaction: After an attachment enters play, gain 1 gold. (Limit once per phase.)
cards.flavor: At first Groleo had wanted the dragons caged and Dany had consented to put his fears at ease, but their misery was so palpable that she soon changed her mind and insisted they be freed.

cards.name: Blue Graces
cards.text: Challenges Action: Remove Blue Graces from the game to choose a card with printed cost 6 or higher in your discard or dead pile and shuffle it into your deck.

cards.name: Dothraki Handmaiden
cards.text: While you control Daenerys Targaryen, you may marshal facedown cards attached to Dothraki Handmaiden as if they were in your hand. Marshaling Action: Reveal an attachment from your hand. Attach it to Dothraki Handmaiden facedown as an attachment.

cards.name: Horselord
cards.text: While Horselord is attacking, it gets +1 STR for each other attacking Dothraki character you control.
cards.flavor: The horselords might put on rich fabrics and sweet perfumes when they visited the Free Cities, but out under the open sky they kept the old ways.

cards.name: Brown Ben Plumm
cards.text: Forced Interrupt: When the challenges phase ends, if you have no gold in your gold pool, sacrifice Brown Ben Plumm.
cards.flavor: "There are old sellswords and bold sellswords, but no old bold sellswords."

cards.name: Womb of the World
cards.text: Action: Kneel Womb of the World to reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. You may chose a Dothraki character revealed this way and put it into play. Shuffle your deck. At the end of the phase, if that character is still in play, return it to your hand.

cards.name: Pentos
cards.text: Reaction: After you draw an attachment, kneel Pentos to reveal that attachment and put it into play. Then, draw a card.
cards.flavor: "There are orchards, farms, mines ... I own some such myself, though I seldom visit them. Why should I spend my days out here, with the myriad delights of Pentos close at hand?" <cite>Magister Illyrio</cite>

cards.name: Khaleesi
cards.text: Lady character only. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which attached character is participating, kneel Khaleesi to, either: stand attached character, or raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1 until the end of the challenge.

cards.name: Dragon Egg
cards.text: Attached character gains insight. Reaction: After the marshaling phase begins, if attached character is Daenerys Targaryen, sacrifice Dragon Egg to search your deck for a Hatchling character and put it into play. Shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Pit Fighter's Blade
cards.text: Attached character gains renown during [military] challenges.
cards.flavor: No one wore armor in the fighting pits. It was blood the crowds came for: death, dismemberment, and the shrieks of agony, the music of scarlet sands.

cards.name: Delena Florent
cards.text: During the challenges phase, non-Bastard characters cannot stand. Reaction: After Delena Florent enters play, search your deck for a Bastard character, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Dragonstone Convert
cards.text: Challenges Action: Name an event. Until the end of the phase, events with that title cannot be played. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Hotho Humpback
cards.text: Challenges Action: Each player draws 1 card. Each player checks reserve. (Limit once per round.)
cards.flavor: "Rodrik has no daughters, only books. Hotho will be his heir, and I will be the king." <cite>Victarion Greyjoy</cite>

cards.name: Ten Towers Galley
cards.text: While Ten Towers Galley is standing, reduce the reserve value on each opponent's revealed plot by 1. Action: Kneel a location with printed cost 2 or higher to kneel Ten Towers Galley. Any player may initiate this ability.

cards.name: Ser Meryn Trant
cards.text: Interrupt: When a card is discarded from an opponent's hand, remove it from the game instead of placing it in his or her discard pile.
cards.flavor: Ser Meryn Trant simply did not care.

cards.name: The Red Keep
cards.text: Interrupt: When the effects of an opponent's triggered character, location, or attachment ability would initiate, kneel The Red Keep to cancel those effects. +1 Income.

cards.name: Tormund Giantsbane
cards.text: Intimidate. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Tormund Giantsbane is participating, place a tale token on him. Action: Discard 1 tale token from Tormund Giantsbane to give a Wildling character +2 STR and renown until the end of the phase.
